attributes.title: Meditation - Idagala, Pingala and Sushumna Nadis
attributes.description:
http://innerawakening.org/
Ultimate Meditation retreat for a Conscious Breakthrough - Inner Awakening

From the works of living enlightened master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  In this beautiful meditation taken from Shiva Sutras, Here, Swamiji reveals a profound meditation technique to AWAKEN THE LIGHT OF ENLIGHTENMENT, as given by Shiva Himself.  Swamiji beautifully describes a tecniques of bringing awareness to the three nadis which represents the intellect, materialisma and intelligece.  This clip was taken from the discourse titles, "Actualize your Potential" which may be ordere donline at www.Lifeblissgalleria.com
